mean_cn: adj. 突如其来的，仓促的，迅猛的；  v. 【气象】凝结；促成，使……沉淀，猛摔；  n. 沉淀物，冷凝物
mean_en: to suddenly force somebody/something into a particular state or condition
sentence: They did not expect the rain to be precipitate as quickly as it did.
sentence_trans: 他们没料到这雨下得如此突然。
word_etyma: pre…前的，预先 + cipit头 + ate做，造成 → precipitate加速，促进
